content.text:
# Sansui Viewers' Choice Movie Awards

The '''Sansui Viewers' Choice Movie Awards were a set of awards presented annually by the Pritish Nandy Communications, a company owned by the journalist and politician Pritish Nandy, and aired on Star India. The function was started in 1998.
Winners and nominees
2003
The winners and nominees have been listed below:
{| role="presentation" class=wikitable
|-
| style="vertical-align:top; width:50%;"|
* Devdas'
** Company
** Kaante
** Raaz
** The Legend of Bhagat Singh
| style="vertical-align:top; width:50%;"|
* 'Sanjay Leela Bhansali – Devdas'
** Abbas–Mustan – Humraaz
** Ram Gopal Varma – Company
** Rajkumar Santoshi – The Legend of Bhagat Singh
** Vikram Bhatt – Raaz
|-
| style="vertical-align:top; width:50%;"|
* 'Shah Rukh Khan – Devdas as Devdas'
** Ajay Devgn – Company as Mallik
** Ajay Devgn – The Legend of Bhagat Singh as Bhagat Singh
** Amitabh Bachchan – Kaante as Yashvardhan
** Vivek Oberoi – Saathiya as Aditya
| style="vertical-align:top; width:50%;"|
* 'Aishwarya Rai Bachchan – Devdas as Paro'
** Amisha Patel – Humraaz as Priya
** Karisma Kapoor – Shakti as Nandini
** Madhuri Dixit – Devdas as Chandramukhi
** Rani Mukerji – Saathiya'' as Suhani
|}
